## TypingsGenerator.generateTypingsAsync() method

Generate typings for the provided input files.

**Signature:**

```typescript
generateTypingsAsync(relativeFilePaths?: string[]): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  relativeFilePaths | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ The input files to process, relative to the source folder. If not provided, all input files will be processed. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
